title: Market share of streaming devices in the United States 2014
summary: This bar chart has 5 columns on the x axis representing Streaming Device, and Market share in each Streaming Device on the y axis.
Streaming Device Apple TV has the highest Market share and Tivo has the lowest Market share.
Streaming Device Apple TV has 7.17 times more Market share than Streaming Device Tivo which is has the lowest.
min_summary: This bar chart has 5 columns on the x axis representing Streaming Device, and Market share in each Streaming Device on the y axis.
Streaming Device Apple TV has the highest Market share and Tivo has the lowest Market share.

Streaming Device Apple TV has the highest Market share and Tivo has the lowest Market share.

max_summary: This bar chart has 5 columns on the x axis representing Streaming Device, and Market share in each Streaming Device on the y axis.
The Market share is highest at Streaming Device Apple TV and lowest at Streaming Device Tivo.
The highest Streaming Device Apple TV has 37.0 more Market share than the lowest Streaming Device Tivo.
The Streaming Device Apple TV has the highest Market share, followed by Roku, and Chromecast. Down to the Streaming Device Tivo which is the lowest.
The Streaming Device Tivo has 2.15 times less Market share than average.
